backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user registration for client, partner, internal, and superadmin roles with access control and per‑principal user IDs.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON structure.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing layout, routing, and dashboard pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base layer defining color variables and theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app implementing manual path-based routing to all pages and a custom 404 component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and caching a backend actor using identity, with query invalidation on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hook managing login, stored identities, and auth client lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query wrapper checking if the actor allows task creation via canCreateTaskUI.
frontend/src/index.css: Duplicate Tailwind theme variables and global styles for the frontend build.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry file mounting App with Internet Identity and react-query providers.
frontend/src/pages/_shared/PageShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing centered content area and footer branding.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientLogin.ts: Client login page with disabled authentication buttons and links to register or return.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientRegister: Client registration form with disabled submit button and fields for basic user info.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Static admin dashboard showing a short status message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AsistenmuD: Static dashboard for Asistenmu role displaying a thank‑you message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ClientDash: Client dashboard allowing task creation based on API query state.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ConciergeD: Static concierge dashboard with a service‑appreciation message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/FinanceDas: Static finance dashboard showing a financial‑health message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PartnerDas: Static partner dashboard with a growth‑focused message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/Superadmin: Static superadmin dashboard indicating full system control and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLand: Internal access landing page linking to internal login and registration.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogi: Internal login with Internet Identity integration, role extraction, and superadmin claim checks.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalRegi: Static internal registration form UI with inputs for name, email, WhatsApp, and role; submit button is disabled.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page offering navigation to client, partner, and internal access options.
Static partner login page showing two disabled login buttons and links for registration and home.
frontend/src/pages/partner/PartnerRegist: Static partner registration form with fields for personal info, skills, and domicile; submit button is disabled.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, backend fix requirements, architectural rules, and known issues.
